title: Ion exchange enabled selective separation from decontamination to desalination to decarbonization: recent advances and opportunities
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00125G, Critical Review
Dian Wang, Yunhao Zhang, Hang Dong, Hao Chen, Arup SenGupta
This review presents some major developments and progress in using ion exchange selective separation for decontamination, desalination, and decarbonization.
